text.name: Home_ThisIsATemplate
text.value: Purchase, Sales, Warehouse and Invoice Management System

text.name: Home_AspNetDescription
text.value: ASP.NET MVC gives you a powerful, patterns-based way to build dynamic websites that enables a clean separation of concerns and that gives you full control over markup for enjoyable, agile development.

text.name: Home_AspNetBoilerplateDescription
text.value: ASP.NET Boilerplate is a framework to build web based applications with best practices and most popular tools.

text.name: Home_AngularDescription
text.value: AngularJs is a Single-Page Application framework by Google. It lets you extend HTML vocabulary for your application. The resulting environment is extraordinarily expressive, readable, and quick to develop.

text.name: About_AspNetBoilerplateDescription
text.value: ASP.NET Boilerplate is a starting point for new web applications with best practices and most popular tools! ASP.NET Boilerplate provides an infrastructure for NLayer architecture and Domain Driven Design.
